tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE returns_and_exchanges (
 id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 issue_description TEXT,
 return_date DATE,
 resolution VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE returns (
    return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_id INT,
    return_reason TEXT,
    return_date DATE
    FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(product_id)
);

CREATE TABLE ReturnIssues (
  issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT,
  issue_description TEXT,
  status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ExchangeIssues (
  issue_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name TEXT,
  issue_description TEXT,
  status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ReturnResolution (
  resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  issue_id INT,
  resolution_info TEXT,
  resolution_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ExchangeResolution (
  resolution_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  issue_id INT,
  resolution_info TEXT,
  resolution_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ProductReturns (
    return_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    return_reason TEXT,
    return_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ProductExchanges (
    exchange_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    exchange_reason TEXT,
    exchange_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ReturnStatus (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    return_id INT,
    status_description TEXT,
    status_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ExchangeStatus (
    status_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    exchange_id INT,
    status_description TEXT,
    status_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE ReturnLogs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    return_id INT,
    log_description TEXT,
    log_date DATE
)
